metadata.dc:author: Rivera Medina, J
metadata.dc:description: This review summarized the current concepts on enteral nutrition of the ill child, appropriate diet considered a therapeutic approach. Nutritional management is based upon the knowledge of natural history of disease, special emphasis is on practical considerations, efficacy and potential advantages, disadvantages and risk of complications, as well as the special metabolic requirements of ill children created by different disease states.
metadata.dc:title: Nutrición enteral en pediatría.
[Enteral nutrition in pediatrics].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
